ingredients.ingredient: ½ (8 ounce) package Neufchatel cheese, softened

cookingTips: Spread softened Neufchatel cheese on prosciutto before wrapping around asparagus
Bake at 350°F for 15-20 minutes until cheese is warm and prosciutto edges curl slightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple appetizer combines crispy, salty, and creamy elements. How will you layer flavors to create the most elegant presentation?
